"King of Hell":
"Man, I thought it'd be different this time...
You can have all the courage in the world,
but if you charge in without skill to back
it up you'll wind up face-down in the dirt.
I took on that Vol Dragon mano-a-mano,
and I almost got killed for it...
I've never felt this frustrated... I really
want to beat this one without your help!
For real, I don't need your help this time!
But, uh, if you're going that way..."
